column2: "Afei Filistiafo nye Israel koe: na Israel mbarimba fii Filistiafo enyim guanee
column3: na wɔtotɔree wɔ Gilboa bepɔw do."

column2: "Na Filistiafo no tsiiw Saul na ne mba no; na Filistiafo no kum Jonatan
"Na ɔko no yɛɛ dzen tsiaa Saul
column3: na egyentofo no too no; na no ho hiahiaa no kɛsenara wɔ egyentofo no ntsi."
Twe w’afona na fa wɔ mo mu; amma monomonomfo yinom aammba ammbɔwɔ me
column4: na woeennsi me atwetwe. Na n’akodzesoanyi no ammpen; osiandɛ osuroo dodow. Dɛm ntsi Saul faa afona no

column2: "Na n’akodzesoanyi no hun dɛ Saul ewu no
column3: ɔno so hwee n’afona do dɛmara

column2: "Dɛm na Saul na ne mbabanyin baasa
column4: na ne mbarimba nyinara so wuwuu prɛko da no ara."

column2: "Na Israel mbarimba a wɔwɔ bɔnsa no egya na hɔn a wɔwɔ Jordan egya no hun dɛ Israel mbarimba no eguan
column3: na Saul na ne mbabanyin atotɔr no
column4: wɔdaan nkurow no gyae; na Filistiafo bae bɛtsenaa mu."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ n’adzekyee no a Filistiafo baa beyiyii atɔfo ho adze no
column3: wohun Saul na ne mbabanyin baasa no dɛ wɔatotɔ wɔ Gilboa bepɔw do."

column4: na wɔsomae ma wɔdze kyiin Filistiafo asaase do hyiae
column5: dɛ wɔnkɔbɔ hɔn abosondan na ɔman no amandzɛɛ."

column2: "Na wɔdze n’akodze no kesiee Ashtarot dan mu: na wɔdze no fun no sɛɛn Bɛt-san ɔfasu ho."
"Na Jabes-gilead atsefo tsee dza Filistiafo dze ayɛ Saul no
column4: "akombarimba no nyinara soɛree nantseew anadwe nyina kɛfaa Saul no fun na ne mbabanyin no hɔn efun no fii Bɛt-san ɔfasu no ho; na wɔbaa Jabes bɛhyeew no wɔ hɔ."

column2: "Na wɔfaa hɔn mbiew kesiee no wɔ ɔsɛntsɛw dua no ase wɔ Jabes
